{"tiddlers": { "$:/plugins/fnaith/Workspace/license": { "created": "20251129064216351", "text": "[[https://creativecommons.org/public-domain/cc0]]", "title": "$:/plugins/fnaith/Workspace/license", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "modified": "20251129064301376" } , "$:/plugins/fnaith/Workspace/readme": { "created": "20251129064216350", "text": ";Workspace Save Current Story River As A Workspace. ;Code and demo * Demo: https://fnaith.github.io/tw-pages/demo/workspace.html * Code: https://github.com/fnaith/tw-pages/blob/main/develop.html", "title": "$:/plugins/fnaith/Workspace/readme", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "modified": "20251206054823089" } , "$:/plugins/fnaith/Workspace/SidebarTab": { "created": "20251129070044322", "text": "\define fnTempWorkspace() $:/temp/fn/workspace{{$:/core/images/folder}} \define fnDefaultWorkspaceName() New Workspace \define fnSaveWorksapceButton() <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="save current workspace">{{$:/core/images/save-button}} <$action-confirm $message={{{ [[Are you sure you want to replace ]addsuffix] }}} $prompt={{{ [is[missing]then[no]] }}}> <$action-setfield $tiddler=<> list={{$:/StoryList!!list}} tags="fn-workspace"/> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> \end

New Workspace

<$edit-text tiddler=<> tag="input" default=<>/> <$let name={{{ [get[text]else] }}}> <> ---

Saved Workspaces

<$list filter="[tag[fn-workspace]!has[draft.of]sort[title]]"> <$let name={{!!title}}> <> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" message="tm-edit-tiddler" tooltip="edit this workspace"> {{$:/core/images/edit-button}} <$button class="tc-btn-invisible" tooltip="delete this workspace"> {{$:/core/images/delete-button}} <$action-confirm $message={{{ [[Are you sure you want to delete ]addsuffix] }}}> <$action-deletetiddler $tiddler=<>/> <$button class="tc-btn-invisible tc-tiddlylink" setTitle="$:/StoryList" setField=list setTo={{!!list}} tooltip="use this workspace"> {{!!title}}
", "title": "$:/plugins/fnaith/Workspace/SidebarTab", "type": "text/vnd.tiddlywiki", "tags": "$:/tags/SideBar", "modified": "20251129081256607", "caption": "{{$:/core/images/folder}}" } } }
title: $:/plugins/fnaith/Workspace
description: Save Current Story River As A Workspace
